byline.contributor: Deborah Sontag and Jeff Zeleny contributed reporting.

snippet: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas found himself on the defensive on Sunday over a report that he had hunted at a camp with a racially charged name that his father, and later Mr. Perry, had leased.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas found himself on the defensive on Sunday over a report that he had hunted at a camp with a racially charged name that his father, and later Mr. Perry, had leased.

headline.main: Snag for Perry: Offensive Name at Texas Camp
headline.print_headline: Snag for Perry: Offensive Name At Texas Camp
headline.seo: Perry’s Link to N-Word Place Name Puts Campaign on Defensive
